baseDomain.description: Base domain already configured in AWS Route53

cpu.description: CPU resources requested by the pause container

image.description: Image used by the pause container

memory.description: Memory resources requested by the pause container

hypershiftImage.description: Container image for the hypershift CLI

hypershiftRoleArn.description: The ARN of the IAM role assumed by the STS credentials provided to the hypershift CLI

imageContentSources.description: Alternate registry information containing a list of sources and their mirrors in yaml format

instanceType.description: AWS EC2 instance type for worker nodes. Use m5.* for amd64 and m6g.* for arm64.

nodePoolReplicas.description: Size of the worker node pool

region.description: AWS region where the cluster will be provisioned

secret.description: Name of the secret containing the credentials for hypershift (AWS account creds, OCP pull secret, SSH keypairs, and base domain)

serviceAccount.description: Service account used for the workload

timeout.description: How long to wait for provisioning to complete (e.g. '20m')
